statements: DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 50000 AND status = 'PENDING';
DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe' AND loan_amount = 50000;
DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM ApprovalStatus WHERE approval_decision = 'Rejected' AND approval_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status = false AND loan_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status = FALSE AND application_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE decision = 'Approved' AND decision_date > '2022-01-01';
